[Contents]
      2. Interpreter Architecture
        2.12. Hook Functions

2.12.22. hook_lock

[<<<] [>>>]

@c lock 

int hook_lock(pExecuteObject pEo,
              FILE *fp,
              int iLockType,
              long lStart,
              long lLength
  )@{
  return file_lock(fp,iLockType,lStart,lLength);
[<<<] [>>>]
